So I thought a lot about Endgame and how we should move on and everything (I know it’s hard!).
And there simply has to be a new...

So I thought a lot about Endgame and how we should move on and everything (I know it’s hard!).

And there simply has to be a new Iron Man!!!

So here are my favorites who could replace Iron Man:

This guy:

Or that one:

I also like him:

Or what about a woman this time?

And what do you think about that one?

I like his smile:

He would also be a good choice:

Who do you like best? 🤗

summary: As we were watching iron man last night, it came out that both of my parents thought Rhodey was named Brody. They have seen...
body: As we were watching iron man last night, it came out that both of my parents thought Rhodey was named Brody. They have seen these movies however many times and consistently heard Brody??? “We’ve been watching these since b4 u were born don’t make fun of us” mom iron man came out in 2008. Not only do you not know Rhodey’s name you don’t know my age?? What do you know?? Hello????

title: Fragments

read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Xc6GO2

by Bacinaru

Raccolta di frasi incentrate sul personaggio di Tony Stark partecipante all'1FraseFic del gruppo Hurt/Comfort Italia.
“Il tempo sembra mettersi in pausa e lo scudo, ancora imperniato nel reattore – il reattore, non il viso, il reattore – trema appena sotto il respiro affannato di Steve, Steve che lo guarda con gli occhi un po’ sorpresi e Tony che si domanda se anche lui, forse solo per un momento, ha creduto di ucciderlo;”

summary: My current theory is that, if, like me, you felt more for Tony's death than Natasha's even though you believe they have the same...
body: My current theory is that, if, like me, you felt more for Tony’s death than Natasha’s even though you believe they have the same value, it’s because marvel didn’t give us her origin story before her death. Literally on the day she died she learned her father’s name, and that’s the only piece of background information we have about her (other than the fact that she can’t have kids which was shoehorned right in there for no other reason than to make her available to Bruce). I love that Natasha opened the door for us to have female heroes, but marvel really did this character dirty.

reblog.comment: My current theory is that, if, like me, you felt more for Tony’s death than Natasha’s even though you believe they have the same value, it’s because marvel didn’t give us her origin story before her death. Literally on the day she died she learned her father’s name, and that’s the only piece of background information we have about her (other than the fact that she can’t have kids which was shoehorned right in there for no other reason than to make her available to Bruce). I love that Natasha opened the door for us to have female heroes, but marvel really did this character dirty.

trail.content_raw: My current theory is that, if, like me, you felt more for Tony’s death than Natasha’s even though you believe they have the same value, it’s because marvel didn’t give us her origin story before her death. Literally on the day she died she learned her father’s name, and that’s the only piece of background information we have about her (other than the fact that she can’t have kids which was shoehorned right in there for no other reason than to make her available to Bruce). I love that Natasha opened the door for us to have female heroes, but marvel really did this character dirty.
trail.content: My current theory is that, if, like me, you felt more for Tony’s death than Natasha’s even though you believe they have the same value, it’s because marvel didn’t give us her origin story before her death. Literally on the day she died she learned her father’s name, and that’s the only piece of background information we have about her (other than the fact that she can’t have kids which was shoehorned right in there for no other reason than to make her available to Bruce). I love that Natasha opened the door for us to have female heroes, but marvel really did this character dirty.
